data.event: The town was first settled around 1772 by pioneers from Scotland.

event.title: was formed from part of the Town of Amsterdam in 1838

data.event: Perth was formed from part of the Town of Amsterdam in 1838, when Fulton County was created.

event.title: 1842, the size of the town was increased

data.event: In 1842, the size of the town was increased by land from the Towns of Broadalbin and Mayfield.
This part of Perth was settled around 1774.
